snippet.title: Battle Moon Wars - Gameplay
snippet.description:
Alright, I'm probably about to put this game away for a while so I decided to up a vid of it. This is just me playing a little bit of a Doujin SRPG called Battle Moon Wars (Created by WERK). A crossover of two Type/Moon franchises, Tsukihime (Better known as Melty Blood) and Fate/Stay Night with a few original characters thrown in. The game was only in japanese but one dude with a TON of patience decided to translate it. Look it up if you want to, I don't feel like linking to anything.

Plain and simple, if you enjoy playing Fire Emblem, you'll get just as much enjoyment out of BMW.

This was me playing Stage 5, there are 53 stages so I didn't show many of the characters, this was just me playing the first turn of the stage. Enjoy. More if out of the blue I decide to actually start playing this game again.

Game plays perfectly by the way, my comp just fails to record anything over 360x240 completely smooth.
